Name: Bushfires: Animal Rescue
About the game: Immerse yourself in an authentic atmosphere of Australian diverse biotops set in fire while exploring the Australian heritage sites and popular sightseeings! Drive through Australia as fast as possible to save endangered and endemic species by catching them into the nets . Extinguishing fire is a critical skill to your survival and to the animals you indent to rescue. Fire is an obstacle on your way to animals to be rescued which spreads differently on a different level. Use water to free animals trapped in fire. Use bait when animals are hiding scared in burrows. Birds are also part of your rescue mission. Finally, explore the lives of animals catched in the journal , including fun facts that you didn't know about. PLEASE NOTE: We’re still hard at work on Bushfires: Animal Rescue! New environments and animals living in the particular biotopes will be added during the course of game development. Please watch the latest YouTube videos to see the game’s latest state. Get started right away in exploring different level’s mechanics set in the iconic Australian desert!
